pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.dao

Interface ContactFormMessageDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContactFormMessageDaoImpl

    public interface ContactFormMessageDao
    Interface for performing database operations on ContactFormMessage objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComment(Comment comment)
      Saves the comment in the database
      void deleteComment(long commentId)
      Deletes the comment with the given id
      ContactFormMessage getContactFormMessage(Long contactFormMessageId)
      Returns the ContactFormMessage with given id
      List<ContactFormMessage> getContactFormMessages(String listType, Integer resultStartRange, Integer resultRange)
      Returns the list of ContactFormMessage objects for given list type (new - archive - all)
      long getNumberOfUnreadContactFormMessage()
      Returns the number of all unread contact form messages
      void sendMessage(ContactFormMessage contactFormMessage)
      Saves the ContactFormMessage object in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(ContactFormMessage contactFormMessage)
        Saves the ContactFormMessage object in the database.

        contactFormMessage - The ContactFormMessage the be saved

        Returns the number of all unread contact form messages

      • getContactFormMessages

        List<ContactFormMessage> getContactFormMessages(String listType,
                                                Integer resultStartRange,
                                                Integer resultRange)
        Returns the list of ContactFormMessage objects for given list type (new - archive - all)
        Parameters:
        listType - A String containing the type of the list
        resultStartRange - An Integer containing the first returning index
        resultRange - An Integer containing the number of results
        Returns:
        A List<ContactFormMessage> representing the list of contactFormMessages
